FinServ_FinancialGoal__c.name: FinServ_FinancialGoal__c
FinServ_FinancialGoal__c.description: This Financial Goal object is installed in your Financial Services Cloud Salesforce org when you install the Financial Services Cloud Managed Package. It represents a clientâ€™s financial goal, such as college funds or a major purchase.

CompletionDate__c.description: Date when the goal was reached.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

Household__c.description: Household that this goal is associated with.

LastActivityDate.description: Timestamp for when this goal last had a task or event action associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the financial goal record.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the goal in an external data source.

Status__c.description: Status of goal. Valid values: Completed In Progress Not Started

TargetDate__c.description: Date when the goal is expected to be reached.

Type__c.description: Purpose of goal. Valid values: Education Home Purchase Other Retirement
